text:
July 28, 1959
Mr* John Marshall
The Rockefeller Foundation
k9 West U9th
Mew York 20, Mew York
Dear Mr. Marshall*
I am taking the liberty of sending you a copy of our forthcoming
MAEB Network offering. I thought you might be interested in what
the nation*s educational radio network is doing. 1 also thought
you might have particular interest in the programs listed on
pages 9, 10, 13, lU, 19, 20, 23, 39, Id., UU, US, S2, and 53.
Sincerely,
HJSiJO
Harry j. Skornia
Executive Director
